Posts.Content: Yvonne17 Hello every one these Letrozole are making my joints so very very painful any one else suffering & any advice ? I can't understand why I need them any way my operation & Radiotherapy was a success so why do I need Letrozole for 5 years any answers please love n hugs Yvonne xxxx you need to take either letrozol or temoxifen for five years to improve your chance of a return .
Posts.Title: Letrozole are dreadful
